title: Allen Chen
text:
Welcome to My Page
Hello! I’m Allen Chen, and this is my personal website where I showcase my projects in data analysis, data science, and more. Feel free to connect with me if you are interested!
Use the navigation bar above to explore my:

title: About
text:
Hello! I’m Allen Chen, and this website consists of my interests, projects, and professional work.


{width=“180px”}
I am passionate about data science, data analysis, GIS, and ML. This site contains my projects, CV, publications, and ways to connect with me.
